plugins.name: Steam Overlay (Hyprland)
plugins.author: blacku
plugins.description: Steam overlay with automatic window management for Hyprland. Automatically moves all Steam windows (except fullscreen games) to overlay workspace as floating windows. Main 3 windows (Friends, Client, Chat) are positioned in a row. Additional windows are brought to top. If new windows don't appear on top, toggle overlay off/on (Super+S twice). Fully responsive with percentage-based layout. Requires Hyprland window manager.
